# Purpose

Medium used to overlay infected Vero cell monolayers during LCMV plaque assays.

# Components (Final Volume: 250 mL)

| Component | Amount |
|----------|--------|
| 2× Eagle MEM without phenol red | 250 mL |
| 200 mM L-glutamine | 5 mL |
| Heat-inactivated FBS (10%) | 25 mL |
| Pen/Strep (10,000 U/mL penicillin G, 10,000 µg/mL streptomycin) | 5 mL |
| Fungizone (amphotericin B 250 µg/mL) | 2.5 mL |

# Preparation

1. Combine all components in a sterile bottle.  
2. Mix thoroughly by gentle inversion.  
3. Store at 4°C for up to 4 weeks.  

# Notes

- Fungizone is optional but recommended to prevent fungal contamination.
